text: You jing ren a! Zai zhongduan yiduan shijian paiqian shizhe hou, wo de shizhe [zhu][mu sheng] que yi lailin nimen, ta jiang wei nimen chanmingzhengdao [yisilan jiao], yimian nimen [jianglai] shuo:“Ji meiyou renhe baoxi zhe, ye meiyou renhe jinggao zhe lailinguo women.”[Xianzai], you wei baoxi zhe [mu sheng] he jinggao zhe [mu sheng] que yi lailin nimen. An la dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
